Title: Correction to: JNK-NQO1 axis drives TAp73-mediated tumor suppression upon oxidative and proteasomal stress (Cell Death and Disease (2014) 5 (e1484) DOI: 10.1038/cddis.2014.408)
Abstract: © 2018 The Author(s).Following publication of their Article JNK-NQO1 axis drives TAp73-mediated tumor suppression upon oxidative and proteasomal stress. Cell Death Dis. 2014, 5:e1484, the authors noted a mistake in Figure 2b, in that, the wells of the crystal violet plates showing growth inhibition induced by withaferin A in HCT 116TP53-/- cells were erroneously duplicated for 1 and 2.5 μM WA. The correct wells for 2.5 μM WA are now included in new figure 2b (please see attached file). The authors apologise for any inconvenience caused. (Figure Presented).
